name: Donut Story: A Holes Journey
description:
Thank you for taking a look at my game for the Brackeys Game Jam!  This was my first game jam and I learned SO MUCH! 

I started this project a bit late.  With only 48 hours to go until the deadline, while working full-time, I dedicated as much time I could to complete a playable game.  While I wish I had more time to complete some of the features I wanted to implement, I am happy with what I did in the short amount of time and how much I learned.
